posts.post_content:
Posted By: Michelle Wise
Ok- I know that this is on a lot of people's wantlists, but thought I'd atleast give it a shot.  A couple of these have recently popped up on ebay, but I havent had any luck on the bigger items lately.  Was hoping to try and find one in low/mid grade, something in the $1400 and less category if at all possible- the cheaper, the better.  Please let me know if anyone has anything within this price range, or any leads as to where I might can find one. thanks, michelle

Posted By: Michelle Wise
Also would like to know if anyone has a low grade N172 Mike Kelly, preferably a non-fielding pose.  Any condition will work as long as it isnt skinned.  Please let me know if anyone can help. thanks, michelle
